content: Hello, Mary Smith. It's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you're interested in renting my apartment in Munich. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much were you considering to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your time, Mister Heine. I'm looking to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible, considering it's a student accommodation. name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: As a landlord, I aim to get the highest price for my property. However, I'm also open to considering your offer if it's fair and reflects the value of the apartment. Please make your best offer, and we can negotiate from there.

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mister Heine. I'm looking to pay a fair price that reflects the size and location of the apartment. Given that it's 25 square meters, I was hoping to start around 750 Euro per month. Does this seem reasonable to you?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Your offer of 750 Euro per month is a starting point for discussion. While it may be on the lower end of what I'm seeking, I'm willing to consider it. Can you provide some details about the terms of your lease, such as the length of the contract and any additional fees?
